name: Dextertiary
description:
Dextertiary - A 2d Game by aAtala, PonchoGuy, Elnu, Joaopedro, HopefulMusings

Decon XL, or Dex for short, is a robot that had just one mission, decontaminate a small planet once inhabited by humans, and now just a fraction of what once has been a prosperous colony. The planet is called AX-33R, or Calaminum, that is how our little Dex call it, due to the high levels of Cadmiun on the atmosphere, result of years and years of human exploration.

Everything was going smooth in the mission, until the lander part of his spaceship failed, causing him to crash land in the planet, then, making come back home his new objective, but for that Dex needs to collect some unstable crystals that powers teleporters across the world, making it possible to collect the parts that he needs to fix his spaceship.

The main objective of the game is find these crystals, and power the teleporter to advance for the next level, but be careful, since this crystals are very powerful ways of obtain energy, they are veeery unstable, so you need to find and use them as soon as possible, or they will blow up with Dex.

This is the teleporter, this is your objective and your ticket back home.

You will need to find a crystal to power it, look for these in furniture using the claw.

Just one object in the level will have a crystal, with this you can make it to the exit.

Watch out for certain bars.

The crystal will only last a certain amount of moves before it explodes. (Blue)

The battery will also deplete over a short time making you also explode. (Green)

Be fast, don't fall.
